about_the_game:
TriMatch, the addicting puzzle challenge where you must match colorful triangles to score big and conquer each level! Strategize and align triangles based on their colored sides to rack up points and unlock the next level. Dive into the world of TriMatch for an addictive and brain-teasing experience that will keep you coming back for more!

How to play
Place matching color tiles, the more matching colors around your placements give you more points. Numbers on the board indicate multipliers. The more tiles filled around the number before placing a tile equals a bigger score and multiplier. If you fill a board you will get a new one with randomly placed multipliers and a timer increase.

You can save up to two tiles in the boxes down in the left corner. Click to place a tile in the square, and click again to pick it back up.

No tiles match?
Click the trashcan in bottom right corner to delete your current tile and get a new one.

Disclaimer: Deleting a tile will decrease your remaining time.

Want to pause the game? Press Escape or the settings icon in top right corner.

Mouse controls
Mouse to move
Left click: Place Tile
Right click: Rotate Tile



Keyboard controls
WASD to move around the board
Q: Rotate left
E: Rotate right
X: Delete current tile
1: Save to slot one
2: Save to slot two
ESC: Pause
